Name.title: Name
Name.description: The key objects for describing OOH media campaigns and products

Type.title: Type
Type.description: How the OOHbject is being quantified

DataSource.title: The identification and inclusion of third party data sources

TargetValues.title: Array of one or more values

Selectable.title: Defines whether a Buyer can select from the given list of TargetValues  or whether the targetValues are fixed

Minimum.title: Defines the minimum number of TargetValues that must be selected

Maximum.title: Defines the maximum number of TargetValues that must be selected

Increment.title: Defines the increments that are permitted for the targeting values

Default.title: Defines the default number of TargetValues that are selected if the Buyer does not specify any TargetValues or the target is not selectable

StatsValues.title: Used for reporting of Scheduled and Delivered Target values

StatsCount.title: Used for counting of Scheduled and Delivered Target values

StatsAverage.title: Used for averaging of Scheduled and Delivered Target values

StatsCountServed.title: The number of times a creative (with a defined spot length) has started playing against Targeted values,  but it may not have been fully played

CreativeId.title: Used to record the ID of the creative that plays against Targeted OOHbjects
